text: any ideas what could cause that ? I tried creating new apps but still have the same issue
Ok I solved the issue in public app. My request had a syntax error in the body (missing `"` in part of the json). It seems I was too focused on the error message which was not relevant at all

However I am at loss on how the next steps would work with a public app. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels#connect-channel-accounts-to-HubSpot|Connect channel accounts to HubSpot> requires the channel to belong to a private app right ? Same in the endpoints, publish a message requires the app to be private it seems
